data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Leningrad, Russia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Leningrad, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Leningrad, Russia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Leningrad.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 998,465 cultural Christians in the state of Leningrad to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Russian-speaking people might believe through him.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Leningrad.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, help the 26,033 believers in Leningrad to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,752,867 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Leningrad. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

location.name: Leningrad
location.cities_list: Saint Petersburg, Kalininskiy, Krasnogvargeisky, Centralniy, Vasyl‘evsky Ostrov
location.cities_list_w_pop: Saint Petersburg (5,028,000), Kalininskiy (504,641), Krasnogvargeisky (337,091), Centralniy (214,625), Vasyl‘evsky Ostrov (203,058)
